text: Keith Greene (5 January 1938 - 7 March 2021) was an English racing driver. He raced in Formula One from 1959 to 1962, participating in six World Championship Grands Prix and numerous non-Championship races. Greene was born in London. Greene died of a cardiac arrest in London on 7 March 2021, aged 83.Notice of Death - Keith Greene (1938 - 2021) ==References== Category:Sportspeople from London Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English Formula One drivers Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Keith Greene
